alert.note: Alert for Vega Alta (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 01 at 7:16PM AST until February 01 at 9:00PM AST by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM AST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Vega Alta, Puerto Rico. * WHEN...Until 845 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 712 PM AST, Minor flooding was reported earlier by Emergency Management in Corozal. Radar indicates rainfall amounts upwards of 1 to 3 inches in Vega Alta, mostly in southern areas. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
